title: MAXIS SCHOLARSHIP 2015
author: Yanty binti Mohammad Sham
contents:
In 2014, Maxis took an exercise to refresh its scholarship programme by opening up the Maxis Scholarship to all Malaysians, with a more active involvement in nurturing exceptional young Malaysians and developing them to become active role models and leaders of their field. In addition to financial support, an integral feature of the scholarship programme is a wide range of training and development and extracurricular activities that will be provided for the scholars to help prepare them for a successful and accelerated path to leadership.

Eligibility:

To be eligible to apply, the applicants must:


    Be a Malaysian citizen

    Not be bonded to any organization

    Obtained an offer from a foreign university

    Have completed or are in the final stage of foundation courses at the time of applying for this scholarship

    Exhibit a strong record of academic achievements

    Exemplify leadership and demonstrate a passion for computer science and technology


 

Application is ONLINE:

https://www.maxis.com.my/en/about-maxis/careers/pdpa-mmap.html

 

Closing date:

20th May 2015

title: BIASISWA  PERSEKUTUAN JPA DI BAWAH PROGRAM IJAZAH DALAM NEGARA (PIDN) - SEMESTER 2 KEATAS
author: Shaifah Haslina binti Kamal
contents:
Adalah dimaklumkan bahawa permohonan biasiswa persekutuan Jabatan Perkhidmatan Awam di bawah Program Ijazah Dalam Negara (PIDN) yang mengikuti pengajian  Ijazah Sarjana Muda di Institusi Pengajian Tinggi Awam (IPTA) dan Institusi Pengajian Tinggi Swasta (IPTS) bertaraf GLC (Government Link Companies) dalam negara bagi sesi 2015/ 2016 akan dibuka pada 18 Mei 2015.

Bagi tujuan tersebut, pelajar-pelajar yang ingin mendapatkan tajaan perlu membuat permohonan secara atas talian (online) http://esilav2.jpa.gov.my/ tanpa perlu mengemukakan keputusan peperiksaan kepada Jabatan ini.

Syarat Permohonan:

1. Pelajar telah melengkapkan sekurang-kurangnya satu semester pengajian atau mempunyai baki tempoh pengajian tidak kurang dari satu tahun / dua semester di peringkat Ijazah Pertama.

Tarikh tutup :

24 Mei 2015

 

Untuk keterangan lanjut  sila hubungi pihak Bursari.

Terima kasih

title: Network  Maintenance
author: Maizan Bin Mahat
contents:
Dear MMU Community,

Please be informed that as part of continuous effort to improve the IT services in Multimedia University,  there will be a network maintenance as per detail below:

 

Date       : 14/05/2015

Day        : THURSDAY

Venue   : MMU Cyberjaya Campus (6.00 pm – 7.00 pm)

Affected services:

•             Internet service at MMU Cyberjaya Campus

 

Date       : 15/05/2015

Day        : FRIDAY

Venue   : MMU Melaka Campus (6.00 pm – 7.00 pm)

Affected services:

•             Internet service at MMU Melaka Campus

 

We would like to apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and thank you for your kind patience and understanding.

 

Thank you

IT Services Division

title: Internship with Lead Solution Management Sdn Bhd
author: Fazli bin Sharil
contents:
Lead Solution Management Sdn Bhd is a company act on behalf of Prudential insurance industry. It is leading company dealing professionally in financial and risk management product. We believed our tailor-made service and product can meet an expectation of every people.

 

 

Industry : Insurance

Location : Muar, Johor

Internship period: 3-6 Months

Allowances : RM 300 per month

Working day : Monday to Friday (Saturday-Optional)

Working hour : 8:30 a.m. – 5:15 p.m. (Monday to Friday)

 

 

During the internship period, you will be exposed to these areas:

 

 Customer service

 Research & Development

 Telemarketing

 Administration

 Data recording

 

 

Requirements:

 

 Undergraduate students majoring in Business studies, Marketing, Sales and other related field.

 Energetic, a good personality and strong communication skills in Mandarin, English and Bahasa Malaysia.

 Proficiency in Microsoft Word and Microsoft Excel

 

 

How to apply:

 

 Provide your resume

 A referral letter from your University

 Exact and end dates of your internship

 

Kindly submit your application to leaderade@hotmail.com. Alternatively, you can also post your application to

 

No.1, 1st Floor, Pusat Perniagaan Sulaiman,

Jalan Sulaiman, 84000 Muar Johor.

 

Contact person :

 

Tel: 06-9565577 Hp: 017-7795152 (Felicia Lim)

 

 

 

by,

Counseling & Career Dev. Unit

title: JOB VACANCIES AT ECO WORLD DEVELOPMENT GROUP BERHAD
author: Fazli bin Sharil
contents:
We are company involved mainly in property development with presence in JB, Penang and Klang Valley, International – United Kingdom, London and Sydney, Australia.

We are currently looking into hiring fresh graduates from your university in the area of Business Studies such as Finance, Marketing, Sales.

Send your resume and academic transcript or result to :

 

Mr Kenny Chin Chau Choong

E-mail  :  kenny.chin@ecoworld.my

Communications & Engagement

Group Talent Management

T 603-33442552 | F 603-33452552

A No. 52, Setia Avenue, No.2, Jalan Setia Prima S U13/S,

Seksyen U13, Setia Alam, 40170 Shah Alam, Selangor

Website :  www.ecoworld.my

Security Department will be issuing the ID card starting from tomorrow 13 May 2015  onwards.

Please bring along your temporary ID for new students and appointment letter for new staffs.

The operation room for the ID card issuance will be at ID card Centre in Security Department, 3rd Floor, STC Building  Cyberjaya and Security Departmen Level 1 Block T (FMD) Melaka

 

Thank you.

 

Security Department

title: {SRC Cyber} “BACK TO SCHOOL” CHARITY DINNER 2015
author: Mohd Naim Bin Mohd Faizal (SRC)
contents:
Assalamualaikum and Good day,

 

Dear Staffs and Students,

 

HI EVERYONE !

HOSTEL COMMITTEE OF CYBERJAYA WILL BE OPENING OUR TICKET BOOTH AT CENTRAL PLAZA FROM TUESDAY 12/5 until THURSDAY 14/5 . COME AND GET YOUR TICKETS THERE AND ALSO LOTS OF TRIPDA VOUCHERS (INCLUDING PETROL VOUCHERS, STARBUCKS & CHATIME) TO BE GIVEN AWAYY !!

 

MMU Cyberjaya Hostel Committee proudly present a charity dinner

where you will be having fun while doing charity.

 

WOW!!!

 

Great food , fun games , prizes , goodies and performances awaits you including a guest artist performance :

MARK ADAM !

(Who is also doing a meet and greet session.)

 

Funds raised via sales of tickets and sponsors will be proceeded to Rumah Amal Baitus Sakinah Wal Mahabbah (BSM) Charity Home

 

SO what are you waiting for..grab your ticket NOW!!!

LIMITED PLACES AVAILABLE!!!

Ticket is only RM30

 

Detail as below:

Date : 15 may 2015

Time : 7.30 pm - 10.45pm

Venue : MPH,MMU cyberjaya

Theme :School Attire

 

Payment must be made in order to secure your seat :

FULL PAYMENT = RM30

 

You can make your payment by BANK-IN to the following account number:

- 7016225913

- CIMB

- Amirah Sayeedah bt. Ali Mahamad

*You must show your proof of payment (print-screen/screenshot) by emailing/whatsapp it to hostelcommittee.mmu@gmail.com or the person who in charge the ticket as details below in order to reserve your seat.

*Your seat is only booked when you made the full payment

 

Please contact person in charge for info or ticket booking

Nadhrah - 012 7409457

Megat - 010 2812612

title: ACADEMIC EVALUATION FOR TRIMESTER 3, 2014,/2015 – EXTENSION OF EVALUATION PERIOD
author: Nurul Faizurah binti Hisham
contents:
Dear Students,

 

Kindly be informed that the academic evaluation exercise (for Short Course, Foundation, Diploma, Degree and Exchange students) is extended until 17th May 2015.

We would like to encourage all students to participate in this exercise.

Kindly ensure that all the lecturers/tutors name teaching all your subjects are available to be evaluated.

Your may e-mail to cqaae@mmu.edu.my should further information is needed.

 

Thank you.

 

CQAAE

title: [CONFIRMED] FINAL EXAMINATION FOR TRI 3 2014/2015 (UNDERGRADUATE, FOUNDATION, DIPLOMA, IELP)
author: Balqis binti Baharuddin @ Baharau
contents:
Dear Valued Students,

Kindly be informed that the CONFIRMED Tri 3 2014/2015 Final Examination Schedule can be viewed on CaMSys (Self Service > My Exam Timetable) today after 5.00pm.

Please check your schedule carefully and feedback to us exam@mmu.edu.my if there is any missing subject from your schedule.

Kindly take note that we have two slots of examinations:


Morning @ 9.00 am

Afternoon @ 2.30 pm (excluding Friday @ 3.00 pm)


The Exam Slip will be ready to be printed out tentatively on 19 May 2015.

Thank you.

Examination and Records Unit
